What information can I find in CatRiskTools?
====================================================

For each model in CatRiskTools, you can find information such as:

* Territory or territories covered by the model
* Primary and secondary perils included
* The model provider and their contact details
* The licence under which the model is available
* Whether or not the model is available on the Oasis Loss Modelling Framework
* Year of release and latest update
* Whether or not the model has a financial module for modelling insurance policies / contract terms
... and much more
